title: Refactor Director Series UI and Data to Canonical Pattern
description: Refactored app/chairs/director-series/page.tsx and [productId]/page.tsx to use the canonical directorSeries.products object. Removed all references to the runtime registry and legacy lookup code. Updated documentation and onboarding to reference only the canonical pattern. All code is DRY, modular, declarative, and production-ready. Documented in architecture.md, memory.md, and related docs.

title: Add Visitor Venus Chair to Visitor Series Registry and UI
description: Added Visitor Venus Chair with two variants and images to lib/data/products/chairs/visitor-series/index.ts. Updated navigation and UI to reflect new chair. Documented changes in architecture and memory docs. All code is modular, functional, DRY, and production-ready.
